content:
# The coal has been successfully inserted into the Stone Furnace, and my inventory now reflects that I have 5 coal and 5 stone left. 
# However, the furnace is currently showing a status of "NO_INGREDIENTS," which indicates that I need to provide it with iron ore to start smelting.

# Next, I will need to gather iron ore from a nearby resource patch. 
# I will locate the nearest iron ore resource and harvest some.

resource_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore resource patch.
move_to(resource_position)  # Move to the closest iron ore patch.
harvest_resource(resource_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 iron ore from the patch.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after harvesting iron ore.
